channel.title: object detection on Dang-Khoa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in object detection on Dang-Khoa's blog

item.title: [WIP] Libra R-CNN: Paper review and comments
item.description: Regarding the object detection problem, it seems like the community pays less attention on training pipeline than other tasks such as network design, inference improvement. This paper investigates the current problem of the CNN detection models. They consider the imbalance phenomenon, which is composed of 3 levels: Sample level. Feature level. Objective level. They basically are 3 corresponding major components of a detection model: feature extraction, region proposals, and predictors.
